## ComplexNumberOperations.getPrincipalSquareRoot() method

Returns the principal square root of a scalar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPrincipalSquareRoot(x: ComplexNumber): ComplexNumber;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>ComplexNumber</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ComplexNumber`

The square root

## Remarks

For real-valued scalar types, this should be the positive square root. For complex-values scalar types, this should be the root with a positive real part.
